article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 179 killed in the past day.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  has  just  issued  an  update,  saying  179  people  have  been  killed  by  Israeli  attacks  in  the  last  day.

sentence: The  total  number  killed  since  the  fighting  erupted  has  risen  to  18,787,  with  nearly  51,000  more  people  wounded,  the  ministry  says.

sentence: Israel  began  its  offensive  on  Gaza  after  Hamas  crossed  the  border  on  7  October,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  240  hostages  -  some  of  whom  were  released  during  a  week-long  truce  last  month.
